alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 2:26PM CDT until November 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Northeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Central Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marshall, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sun Prairie, Beaver Dam, Mayville, Columbus, Marshall, Horicon, Juneau, Fall River, Hustisford, Iron Ridge, Burnett, Reeseville, Clyman, Lowell, Kekoskee, Deansville, East Bristol, Atwater, Danville and South Beaver Dam. This includes the following Location Horicon Marsh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
